Hi there, I just released a new video. It's been a year, but I'm finally back with a boom!

I hope you enjoy the first episode of my newest series. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Bluesubstance

This is great! Great video editing. Though I have a couple of questions: WHY Jeb gotta go? \*Love the M.I.A for hitting a nuclear missle\* Also what visual mod is that, that you used in the video. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Other than that, it was awesome.

I'm glad you enjoyed my video! I used the "Scatter" Mod, which can be found here. ([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115408-WIP-Scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-mod-%28v0-0151-20-05-2015%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115408-WIP-Scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-mod-%28v0-0151-20-05-2015%29))

Jeb had to go because I needed an unexpected moment, I didn't want him to die. I'm glad you noticed the M.I.A thing. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks for watching my video,

Bluesubstance

haha, nice video

now we also know why and how wars start on earth too, there is always a Bob a ROB or a Noob to start that job ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
first off this is basically mutually assured destruction. and second the MIA Jeb page says "May The All Rest In Peace" which is not grammatically correct but what ever, AWESOME VIDEO!!!
Thank you all for 300 views! Keep it going. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
